All Classes

Class
Description
AvailableBus
AvailableBus class represents the class whose object will be pass when user will search for buses of his/her requirement
Bus
Bus represents bus in database It has the attributes busId, routeId, busType and busProvider
BusBookingApplication
Main class of project
BusRepository
BusRepository contains queries related to buses and bookings
BusRepositoryTest
Codes for testing of BusRepository class
City
City class represents city in our database.
CityRepository
TicketRepository contains queries related to ticket
CityRepositoryTest
Codes for testing of CityRepository class
GenerateTicket
GenerateTicket class is used to have all the details in ticket It has attributes bookingId, userName, userPhoneNumber, userAddress, busId, startLocation, endLocation, dateOfBooking, journeyDate, numberOfSeats and totalFare
GenerateTicketController
This is a controller class which contains url for generateTicket API
GenerateTicketControllerTest
Codes for testing of GenerateTicketController class
MyBookingController
This is a controller class which contains url for the myBooking API It takes userId as a input and returns List of ticket booked by that user
MyBookingControllerTest
Codes for testing of MyBookingController class
Price
Price class represents price table in our database It has attributes routeId and ticketPrice
Route
Route class represents route table in database It has attributes routeId, fromCityId, toCityId, departureTime, arrivalTime
SaveUserController
This is a controller class which contains url for saveuser API It saves the details of the user in database in user Table
SaveUserControllerTest
Codes for testing of SaveUserController class
SearchController
This controller contains url for search API
SearchControllerTest
Codes for testing of SearchController class
Seat
Seat class represents seat table in database It has attributes busId and totalSeat
ServiceLayer
It contains methods which interacts with controllers and repositories
ServiceLayerTest
Codes for testing of ServiceLayer class
Ticket
Ticket table represents ticket table in the database It has attributes bookingId, userId, busId, numberOfSeats, dateOfBooking, journeyDate and routeId
TicketRepository
TicketRepository contains queries related to ticket
TicketRepositoryTest
Codes for testing of TicketRepository class
Users
User class represents user table in database It contains attributes userId, userName, userPhoneNumber, userAddress
UsersRepository
UserRepository contains queries related to user's data
UsersRepositoryTest
Codes for testing of UsersRepository class
